item.title: Mero Health
item.description: Despite the development of technology the general people are unable to utilise its benifitis in health sector properly. So we developed an Android App which is a complete one stop solution for patient’s appointment, medial record keeping, payment and recomendation of doctors/physicians according to the symptoms they are having. We tried to co-relate the patients’ symptoms and their preferences with the type of doctors they need to visit. About App: Following are the technical specifications of our app.
